author: Iskandar
title: autograder explanation
question:
I have just been doing some work on https://cs110.students.cs.ubc.ca/autograder.html which is intended to provide reference material on autograder reports. What I have done so far is:
Update the link in the grading report email to point to this location
Revise the explanations of signature, test validity and both kinds of test thoroughness.
We will add more as time goes on.
Comments and suggestions are welcome.
